body.name: JBL Clip 4 - Portable Mini Bluetooth Speaker, big audio and punchy bass, integrated carabiner, IP67 waterproof dustproof, 10 hours of playtime, speaker for home, outdoor travel (Blue)
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Just Right!.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 15 hrs 47 mins.
features: RICH JBL ORIGINAL PRO SOUND: The legendary JBL signature sound delivers surprisingly big audio and punchy bass from Clip 4's small size.

ULTRA-PORTABLE DESIGN AND INTEGRATED CARABINER: JBL Clip 4's ultra-portable design with a redesigned integrated carabiner for extra protection, take your JBL Clip 4 anywhere and everywhere. Just clip on a belt, strap, or buckle and go explore the world.
10 HOURS OF PLAYTIME: Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery. Clip 4 gives you up to 10 hours of playtime on a single charge.
WIRELESS BLUETOOTH STREAMING: Wirelessly stream music from your phone, tablet, or any other Bluetooth-enabled device.
IP67 WATERPROOF AND DUSTPROOF: To the pool. To the park. In the shower. JBL Clip 4 is fully waterproof and dustproof, so you can bring your speaker anywhere.
body.description: Cool, portable, and waterproof. The vibrant fresh looking JBL Clip 4 Bluetooth speaker delivers surprisingly rich JBL Original Pro Sound in a small package. The unique oval shape fits easy in your hand. Fully wrapped in colorful fabrics with expressive details inspired by current street fashion, it’s easy to match your style. The fully integrated carabiner hooks instantly to bags, belts, or buckles, to bring your favorite tunes anywhere. IP67 Waterproof, dustproof, and up to 10 hours of battery life, it’s rugged enough for any outdoor adventure. • JBL Clip 4 portable mini Bluetooth speaker• Rich JBL Original Pro Sound• Ultra-portable design and integrated carabiner• 10 hours of playtime• Wireless Bluetooth Streaming• IPX67 Waterproof and dustproof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice And Portable
reviews.reviewText: Great little speaker! Got this to wear around when I am doing chores or working. Clips easily onto a belt loop, also its waterproof so you can clip it on the shower curtain hanger or something when showering. It's not so big that you can't clip it on your belt and go jogging. It's about the size of a smallish single patty hamburger. Gets decently loud; will fill a normal sized room, nothing earshattering but fine. The sound is a bit weak and muddy in the bass of course, but it's really not too bad. The spoken voice and singing range is very clear though, so although your electronic/dance/club etc music will sound washed out, pop and rock should be okay. Good for listening to audio books, podcasts, also listened to a classical piano performance and it was nice. For the money it's awesome; I charged it when I first got it and have been playing it a few hours a day for three days now, haven't needed to recharge it yet. Worth the money. Thumbs up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Portable Speaker!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because I travel a lot for work and always wish I had a small speaker to listen to music while in my hotel room rather than using my earbuds (I prefer to save my earbud battery life). Instead, I ended up using this thing ALL THE TIME! I use it in my hotel room, outside on the porch, in the shower (because waterproof!), outside around the firepit and I also end up taking it from room to while I clean when I don't want to disturb the entire house with surround sound. I do NOT recommend submerging this speaker but I did accidentally drop mine in the bath and it's been totally fine since. The sound is clear, with a surprising amount of bass, and it can be clipped onto almost anything - highly recommend purchasing a skin/case like the one I have so that it can stand on it's own.Many of the negative reviews mentioned a mediocre sound quality or battery life but, I think to be fair, you must consider that this is a tiny handheld speaker not intended to sound like a home stereo sound system or sound bar. It's also important to keep in mind that the battery life depends on whether you have the volume on full blast every time you use it (I normally do and I still find that about 8-10hrs of run time is pretty accurate). Also keep in mind that the speaker turns off after about 20 minutes of idle time - so if you fail to turn it off every time you use it, that time it takes to turn off takes away from your overall battery life. Even with these things, I still give this thing 5 stars overall. I even purchased one for my best friend.The ONLY cons I have found that affect my experience, but aren't big enough of a deal to sway how much I love this product, are:1. You can double-press the play button to go to the next song, but there is no way to restart or go back to a previous song (this is annoying if you accidentally skip a song you wanted to hear)2. This model does NOT connect or sync with the JBL app (not a deal breaker but would be a nice option)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the build quality, it’s actually better than expected. The sound is pretty clear and loud, and I love that I can clip it to things. I work at a ski resort and this is the only way I can listen to music. Battery lasts as advertised, but it will die sooner if it plays at 100% volume the whole day. The cold can affect it too, so keep it warm and your battery will last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coolest dude at the beach
reviews.reviewText: Okay, bought this bad boy because we spend a lot of time at the beach, and after losing an odd number of white AirPods to the sand gods, finally decided I needed something a wee bit safer (ok, cheaper too). This definitely did not disappoint. It clipped right onto our beach bag, and most importantly, stayed clipped to our beach bag. Hooking up Bluetooth was a breeze, and the sound quality was great. I mean, it didn’t bug the neighbors, but we definitely enjoyed some tunes while hiding our snacks from the seagulls. And the best part was I didn’t have to constantly keep taking my headphones out for every question my wife had for me. Win/win! Buy it, you’ll like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my sister for Christmas. It’s compact so she can take it with her while horseback riding and the volume it’s just perfect. Battery time is also good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, small, portable speaker.
reviews.reviewText: Well made, great sound quality and is surprisingly loud. The hook is a great feature as you can just hook it on a belt loop and go. Easy to connect to your phone or Bluetooth device.The only downside is the battery life. At 80% volume, you get about 5-6 hours of use. Takes about 45mins to totally recharge. I had a clip 3 that I could use all day(8hrs) without having to recharge. Other than that, it’s a great product for a fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars sturdy and safe surprisingly
reviews.reviewText: so i’ve had this speaker for some months now and i love it for it’s practicality. not THE loudest, not THE best sound quality but my last one was an altec lansing so i’ve been spoiled however one thing i’ve got to say is i took this baby on vacation with me last summer and the outlet at the airbnb like… blew up?? and my extension cord and charger broke and it left visible damage on my speaker but she still works perfectly fine even the waterproof is still waterproofing i would 100% repurchase this after real life experiencing her durability (also i purchased a case off amazon when i bought this and have had them paired the whole time with no problems)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel and Golf
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to take a small speaker with great sound on a trip so that we could listen to musing in the hotel room. This was the perfect speaker. I knew I the sound was going to be good since I have larger JBLs. I really like the carabiner feature since I think it sound a little better in the open instead of laying on a surface. This feature also makes it a very good candidate to hang on my golf bag.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easily portable, hangable w/ great sound.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. To start out the shipping was very quick and I’m so grateful that I got it at the price that I did.The colour is beautiful and gives it personality.When watching movies and listening to music I like having amplified sound; so that’s my main use.The sound is powerful, obviously not as powerful as the larger JBL speakers, but more than you’d expect from something of the size which I find quite impressive.Typically, the speaker will automatically connect to the last device that it was connected to once turned on.All of the buttons are easy to use and don’t require much pressure.So far, I can’t complain about the battery life because I've only used it at home. I’ll do my best to remember to update this review once I utilize it away from home— where can be more mindful of how long it takes to run out of battery.Overall, I’m super content.
Llego muy bien empaquetado, le dura la pila 🔋 un poco más del promedio de otra bocinas. Muy Practica y de muy buen sonido

reviews.reviewTitle: Increíble bocina, versátil y decente precio
reviews.reviewText: La conseguí en barata y es 100% recomendado, en su precio normal aún se recomienda si tiene ese Morelos extra, buena duración de batería, buena conectividad, versátil, la potencia sorprende por el tamaño, muy bueno para llevar en la bici, en el jardín o si quieres un poco mas de umpfff al ver videos en tu cel, obvio no es suficiente para una reunión pero mejor que nada. lo recomiendo, JBL es buena marca.Sonido: Bajos decentes pero livianos, medios con muy buena definición e intensidad, altos decepcionantes pero no se distorsiona mucho. Para el precio está difícil encontrar algo mejor.
Adorei! Foi a melhor compra que pode fazer ainda em 2023 e o som é bem alto, veio rápido e é um produto de ótima qualidade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Marvellous speaker for indoors or outdoors
reviews.reviewText: The JBL Clip 4 truly surprised me with its incredible sound quality, given its compact size. Whether paired with my phone or enhancing the projector experience, the sound quality is nothing short of phenomenal - pure bliss to your ears!I would definitely recommend it to anyone seeking a portable speaker with exceptional audio performance and a great battery life.
